long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the Qibla direction effortlessly with the aid of online maps. This innovative plugin seamlessly retrieves your location details and generates a line on the map connecting you directly to the Kaaba, all without transmitting any data externally! Thus, you can easily find the Qibla direction of your location on the online map. By applying the Qibla direction line to the streets, houses and other elements around you, you will see how simple it is to find the Qibla direction. If you want to see your Qibla direction line on a large screen, you can visit our website. You can also obtain the qibla degree for the compass for your location there.
